vclaim: A viral article purporting to be the obituary of Margaret Ruth Groening, mother of "The Simpsons" creator Matt Groening, is authentic and accurately describes the origins of the names of some of the show's characters.
title: Is This the Real Obituary of Margaret Groening, Mother of ‘Simpsons’ Creator Matt Groening?
subtitle: Margaret was reportedly married to a man named Homer.
author: Madison Dapcevich
